cookiesText.cookiesDescription:
Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.

We use cookies to store information about how you use our online services. These cookies are not used to identify you personally.

You can choose most cookies you're happy for us to use.

websiteUseCookies.descriptionText:
We use Google Analytics to measure how you use our online services so we can improve them based on user needs. Google Analytics sets cookies that store anonymised information about:

  • how you got to the site
  • the pages you visit and how long you spend on each page
  • what you click on while you're visiting the site

We do not allow Google to use or share the data about how you use this site.
